Cubemap(GraphicsDevice, Image, Image, Image, Image, Image, Image, bool, bool)

Initializes a new instance of the Cubemap class from images.

public Cubemap(GraphicsDevice graphicsDevice, Image positiveX, Image negativeX, Image positiveY, Image negativeY, Image positiveZ, Image negativeZ, bool mipmap = true, bool srgb = false)

Parameters

graphicsDevice GraphicsDevice

The graphics device.

positiveX Image

The image for the positive X face of the cubemap.

negativeX Image

The image for the negative X face of the cubemap.

positiveY Image

The image for the positive Y face of the cubemap.

negativeY Image

The image for the negative Y face of the cubemap.

positiveZ Image

The image for the positive Z face of the cubemap.

negativeZ Image

The image for the negative Z face of the cubemap.

mipmap bool

Specifies whether to generate mipmaps.

srgb bool

Specifies whether the images should be loaded as sRGB.
